skill.name: pdf
skill.description: PDF manipulation toolkit. Extract text/tables, create PDFs, merge/split, fill forms, for programmatic document processing and analysis.
skill.summary: PDF manipulation toolkit. Extract text/tables, create PDFs, merge/split, fill forms, for programmati...
skill.author: K-Dense-AI

security_audit.summary: This is a legitimate PDF processing toolkit. All scripts perform local file operations only using standard PDF libraries. No network calls, credential access, code execution abuse, or data exfiltration patterns were detected. The code is clean and readable with no obfuscation.

content.user_title: Process PDFs with scripts and form tools
content.value_statement: Manual PDF handling is slow and error prone. This skill provides scripts and guidance to convert, inspect, and fill PDF forms reliably.
actual_capabilities: Convert PDF pages to PNG images for visual review
Detect whether a PDF has fillable form fields
Extract fillable field metadata with page and bounding box data
Fill fillable form fields with validated values
Add text annotations to non fillable PDFs using bounding boxes
Validate bounding boxes for accurate annotation placement
limitations: Requires a local Python environment with required PDF libraries installed
Does not perform OCR on scanned images or image-only PDFs
Non fillable forms require manual bounding box definition and validation
Cannot process password-protected PDFs without the password

use_cases.title: Batch form completion
use_cases.description: Fill standard intake PDFs with structured field values and validation checks.

use_cases.title: Document extraction prep
use_cases.description: Convert PDFs to images to review layout before table or text extraction.

use_cases.title: Form accuracy review
use_cases.description: Validate bounding boxes to ensure correct placement of annotations in filled forms.

prompt_templates.title: Check for fillable fields
prompt_templates.scenario: Determine if a PDF has form fields
prompt_templates.prompt: Check whether this PDF has fillable fields and tell me which path to use next.

prompt_templates.title: Extract field metadata
prompt_templates.scenario: Generate field info for a fillable PDF
prompt_templates.prompt: Extract fillable field metadata to JSON and list any fields without locations.

prompt_templates.title: Prepare non fillable layout
prompt_templates.scenario: Define bounding boxes for labels and inputs
prompt_templates.prompt: Guide me to create fields.json and validation images for a non fillable PDF.

prompt_templates.title: Fill and validate
prompt_templates.scenario: Complete a PDF and verify inputs
prompt_templates.prompt: Validate my field values and fill the PDF, then report any errors.

output_examples.input: Fill this application form with the following data: name=Smith, email=smith@example.com, and check the agreement checkbox.
output: Validated 3 fields with matching page numbers
All checkbox values match allowed states

best_practices: Run fillable field detection before choosing a workflow
Review validation images for non fillable forms before writing output
Keep field values and page numbers consistent with extracted metadata
anti_patterns: Skipping validation images for non fillable forms
Using field values that are not in allowed option lists
Assuming scanned PDFs can be processed without OCR

faq.question: What PDF types are compatible?
faq.answer: The scripts handle standard digital PDFs, including fillable forms. Scanned images need external OCR tools.

faq.question: What are the main limits?
faq.answer: Non fillable forms need manual bounding boxes, and OCR is not provided by this skill.

faq.question: Can I integrate this into a pipeline?
faq.answer: Yes. Scripts can be called from shell or Python workflows with local files as input.

faq.question: How is my data handled?
faq.answer: All processing is local. The scripts do not send data over the network or access credentials.

faq.question: What if validation fails?
faq.answer: Fix bounding boxes or field values, then rerun the validation script with corrected inputs.

faq.question: How does this compare to cloud PDF tools?
faq.answer: This is local and scriptable, offering more control and privacy but less automation than cloud services.
